explanation: [0-0] In an outdoor setting, a person in a blue top stands on a leaf-covered ground, holding a shotgun. Their left hand is on the stock's end, and the right hand is near the trigger. A black target is visible in the background.

[0-8] The person disengages the safety with their right hand and raises the gun. To the left, a man in a blue top and gray hat, wearing orange earplugs, is visible. There are many black targets and trees above. He moves slightly, the gun emits white smoke, and a black target on the upper right shakes.
